description:
Wait, we have an anime now? Why would someone ever animate— Er, we mean... Quick; someone come up with topics to discuss! We have ratings to think about!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fudan Mondou / Fuku Chigai / Sakebi Shinan
Normal Dialogue / Different Clothes / Shouting Instructions
普段問答 / ふく違い / 叫び指南
